refnamediv.refpurpose:
Adds or updates one or more businessService
structures.

refsect2.title: authInfo
refsect2.para:
This required argument is an element that contains an authentication token obtained using the get_authToken
call.

refsect2.title: businessService
refsect2.para:
One or more complete businessService
structures can be passed. These structures can be obtained in advance by using the get_serviceDetail
call or by any other means.

refsect1.title: Return Types
refsect1.para:
This message returns a serviceDetail
message that reflects the newly registered information for the affected businessService
structures.

refsect1.title: Errors
refsect1.para:
If an error occurs in processing this message, a dispositionReport
structure will be returned to the caller in a SOAP Fault. The following error information will be relevant:

row.entry:
signifies that the request cannot be satisfied because one or more uuid_key
values specified is not a valid key value. This includes any tModelKey
references that are unknown.

signifies that the authentication token value passed in the authInfo
argument is no longer valid because the token has expired.

signifies that the authentication token value passed in the authInfo
argument is either missing or is not valid.

signifies that one or more of the uuid_key
values passed refers to data not controlled by the entity that the authentication token represents.

signifies that one or more of the uuid_key
values passed refers to data not controlled by the server that received the request for processing.

signifies that the request cannot be satisfied because one or more uuid_key
values specified has previously been hidden or removed by the requester. This specifically applies to the tModelKey
values passed.
